attributes.action: Lord Taylor and Lord Hanningfield should be removed from the house of lords
attributes.additional_details:
Lord Taylor and Lord Hanningfield have proven that they are corrupt and criminals.
In their position is it not acceptable and they should be setting the moral standards of the country.
If this crime was committed by any other person in society they would loose their job.
So I proposed that they also pay the same price, surely this would be the FAIR thing to do.
